final_check.email_info: An email was sent to jamiedavies@gmail.com, containing a validation code that you must paste here to activate your account.

kyc_condition.title: KYC/AML Conditions
condition: I hereby confirm that I read and agree with the Terms and Conditions of Service, Privacy Policy, and Cookies Policy.

I hereby confirm that all information above is true and accurate. I understand that giving false or misleading information will make immediate cancelation of services and may bring on legal proceedings.
I undertake to immediately inform Hedpay UAB about any changes in the information above in writing form.

I hereby confirm that the funds transferred have legal background. Services offerred by Hedpay UAB will not be used for any illegal purposes, and I will not take part in any operation, which is considered illegal money laundering and terrorism financing.

I am informed that my relationship with Hedpay UAB is handled in accordance with the Law on the Prevention of Money Laundering and Terrorist Financing of the Republic of Lithuania and the underlying laws and regulations of EU and EEA, and I am completely aware of my obligations which I undertake by signing below.

I hereby agree that the legal relationship establishment between myself and Hedpay UAB allows Hedpay UAB to make use of or share my data with any third party according to the law, including any request for additional information.

term_condition.title: Terms and conditions
term_condition.first_sen: Our failure to enforce any right or provision of these Terms will not be considered a waiver of those rights. If any provision of these Terms is held to be invalid or unenforceable by a court, the remaining provisions of these Terms will remain in effect. These Terms constitute the entire agreement between us regarding our Service, and supersede and replace any prior agreements we might have between us regarding the Service.
term_condition.sec_sen: We reserve the right, at our sole discretion, to modify or replace these Terms at any time. If a revision is material we will try to provide at least 30 days notice prior to any new terms taking effect. What constitutes a material change will be determined at our sole discretion. By continuing to access or use our Service after those revisions become effective, you agree to be bound by the revised terms. If you do not agree to the new terms, you must stop using the service.
term_condition.thir_sen: Please refer to our Privacy Policy and Cookies Policy. You agree that they constitute part of these terms. You must read our Privacy Policy and Cookies Policy before you use the Service.
term_condition.four_sen: If you have any questions about these Terms, please contact us compliance@hedpay.com

step_1.action: Install the Google Authenticator mobile app

step_2.action: Scan this QR code with the Google Authenticator
step_2.tip: If you can't scan the QR code, enter this code manually into the app

step_3.action: Please copy this key into a safe place. It'll allow you to reset your Google Authenticator even if you lose your phone
step_3.tip: Resetting your Google Authenticator requires opening a support ticket, and takes at least 7 days to process

phone_confirmation_modal.heading: Enter your phone number to receive a confirmation code

landing.heading: The future banking solution
landing.subheading: HEdpAY is one of the first projects connecting traditional bank and the crypto universe

intro.heading: Hedpay in a nutshell
intro.text: HEDPAY's objective is to make the traditional banking market leaner, faster, more efficient and at the same time, to better regulate the crypto or digital assets market, making it safer and intuitive by all consumers, even people less familiar with the technology, HEDPAYâ€™s mission to bridge the gap between traditional banks and crypto finance that uses blockchain technologies, to become the future banking solution.

features.heading: HEdpAY Unique Features
features.text: B2B, B2C, C2C and Mainly all are P2P (Peer to Peer)

subsection_1.heading: Send Funds Worldwide Instantly and with no Fees
subsection_1.text: HEdpAY e-banking is an innovative banking solution, aiming to provide fast and convenient solutions for banking and FinTech, to businesses and consumers alike. This is the future banking solution to FIAT and Crypto transactions on the go, ATM, POS and Online accounts.

social_media.heading: Follow Us on Social medias
social_media.subheading: Refer a Friend Earn Rewards Hdp.dp
social_media.text: Follow HEdpAY and Share on your social channels, to gather Hdp.dp rewards. Simply provide your Follow and Share LINK to claim your reward.

holding.heading: Hold over 10,000 Hdp.dp Earn Annual 7%
holding.text: Get ahead of the curve and join the growing number of investors who share the HEdpAY vision to revolutionise personal and business banking with blockchain

wallet.heading: Wallet
wallet.paragraph_1: Take advantage of HEdpAYâ€™s Ethereum based wallet that is ERC-223 & ERC-20 compatible and allows you to deposit and retain other Crypto and Fiat currencies.
wallet.paragraph_2: Need cash? Withdraw from your HEdpAY wallet onto your unique HEdpAY card, and withdraw from any ATM in the world.
wallet.annotation: * Further Cryptocurrencies and Currencies will be announced

exchange.heading: Smart Exchange
exchange.text: Trade and exchange freely between cryptocurrencies and pair to other major Fiat currencies using our innovation and secure Exchange. Simultaneously transact, transfer and withdraw in a secure environment Instant withdrawals to your HEdpAY account, wallet and card all within one platform, saving you time and reducing cost.

referal.coverDesc: Each referral receives 10 Hdp as a new user for the fact of registration on Hedpay. Each referrer receives 5% in Hdp tokens from each purchase of the referral.
